properties.name: --color-bg
properties.description: Page background. Auto-switches with theme. Use this!

properties.name: --color-fg
properties.description: Page text color. Auto-switches with theme. Use this!

properties.name: --color-hover
properties.description: Hover background for buttons/links. Auto-switches with theme.

properties.name: --color-link
properties.description: Link text color. Auto-switches with theme.

properties.name: --color-link-hover
properties.description: Link hover color. Auto-switches with theme.

properties.name: --color-bg-light
properties.description: Raw token: light background. Use for forcing light theme.

properties.name: --color-bg-dark
properties.description: Raw token: dark background. Use for forcing dark theme.

properties.name: --color-fg-light
properties.description: Raw token: light text. Use for forcing light theme.

properties.name: --color-fg-dark
properties.description: Raw token: dark text. Use for forcing dark theme.

properties.name: --color-hover-light
properties.description: Raw token: light hover. Use for forcing light theme.

properties.name: --color-hover-dark
properties.description: Raw token: dark hover. Use for forcing dark theme.

properties.name: --color-border-light
properties.description: Raw token: light border. Use for forcing light theme.

properties.name: --color-border-dark
properties.description: Raw token: dark border. Use for forcing dark theme.

properties.name: --padding-top-page
properties.description: Page top padding (5.5rem) - clears fixed nav

properties.name: --step-max-width
properties.description: Max width of step text boxes (400px)

properties.name: --scrolly-pointer-events
properties.description: Pointer events for scrolly (auto or none for click-through)

properties.name: --nav-fg
properties.description: Nav text color. Follows --color-fg by default.

properties.name: --nav-hover
properties.description: Nav hover state. Follows --color-hover by default.

properties.name: --footer-bg
properties.description: Footer background. Defaults to UVM Green.

properties.name: --story-step-bg
properties.description: Background for scrolly steps in stories.

properties.name: --story-step-fg
properties.description: Text color for scrolly steps in stories.

properties.name: --panel-height
properties.description: Sticky panel height in split/triple layouts.

properties.name: --panel-width
properties.description: Sticky panel width % in split layout (45%)

properties.name: --panel-min-width
properties.description: Min sticky panel width in split layout (450px)

properties.name: --panel-top-offset
properties.description: Vertical centering offset for sticky panels.
